name: simple-logger
description: A simple JS Logger written in TypeScript
author: Aur√©lien Manteaux <amanteaux@coreoz.com> (https://coreoz.com)

scripts.build: npm run tsc:cjs && npm run tsc:esm
scripts.prepare-release: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.publish-patch: npm run prepare-release && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run prepare-release && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: npm run prepare-release && npm version major && git push && npm publish
